titles.title: You can have a melody down in your heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You can have a melody down in your heart
When itâ€™s aching, almost breaking.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Even though the sorrow makes tear drops start
You can have the melody down in your heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You can have a song in your heart in the night,
After every trial, after every mile.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Anyone can sing when the sun is shining bright
But you need a song in your heart at night,
But you need a song in your heart at night.
